#summary The project outline to make the documentation more structured.

= What is the cfeditor? =
cfeditor stays for configuration editor and is designed for the cfengine version 3 Configuration Management Engine. More about cfengine: http://www.cfengine.org.
It is implemented as the Eclipse plugin. More about Eclipse platform: http://http://www.eclipse.org

Using the cfeditor, system administrators can create the structured projects, check the cfengine syntax, use the Version Control system to manage the project changes, and others...
